author: todd bogataj
comment: It's better then the previous versions!! I wish they would make an app for my Samsung Gear S watches that's one of the most popular smart watches on the market it's been out 3 years and they haven't made it app for the times and system how ridiculous I wish they would do it please somebody make the app....  1-3-18  I have bought the Samsung Gear S3, and its still NOT supported!!! COME ON VIPER!! GET WITH THE PROGRAM... Samsung doesn't have an android wear platform for it's watches.... please update your software

author: Brandon Abernathy
comment: Voice actions don't work at all. Claims to support them on website, but I have confirmed permissions and everything I can think of but nothing will allow it to work. All I can do is open app with voice. It's also really slow to connect to the car and start it. It would be nice if it was faster.

author: Mark Chisholm
comment: So far the app is working well but seems to have a short fall that I concidering pretty big. It will send you a notification when an alarm trips but does not show you what the alarm was for (ie door, Hood, shock sensor, etc). Would be nice to know how urgent the matter is.

author: Rick Michaelson
comment: App works well. On the Android Wear app, would love to be able to customize the placement of screens. Remote Start is the first window but I would rather have the lock/unlock screen first. There's also a bit of a lag before my car unlocks.

author: JOHN COBB
comment: Great app, especially for those verrrry cold Chicago mornings.  Has nevet failed.  One of the really cool things is the ability to remotely start from any location, even from another city, it really freaked my friends out. The only minor draw back is I wish there wad some type of animation to show engine is really on, i.e. fan, exhaust smoke, etc. Absolutely love it!!!

author: trulydvs
comment: For some reason this new update is going through battery percentage consistently. The other thing i find interesting is how you get it for car security and you have to give up your phone security and privacy for it.  It demands access  to your camera and files which have nothing to do with a car alarm. .. I've had it for almost 3 years, works great for the alarm but the privacy and battery issue are a draw back

reply.author: Directed Electronics
reply.content:
Hello,

Can't ID you from your Play Store ID, can you contact us by email to support@mysmartstart.com on the battery usage question? Shouldn't have that impact normally. 

On the security/privacy, only reason for those permissions is if you add an image of your car to the app. We don't access that stuff otherwise but Google requires the disclosure.

author: Robert Prichard
comment: 1 car is a pain for the bluetooth and my other car so far is working. So its hit or miss. Neat ap but would not use this as a selling point in the bluetooth part of the ds4.

author: David Arroyo
comment: The alarm system and app worked perfectly fine for the last couple of months, but now recently my mobile app keeps giving an error 25 message saying my vehicle needs to be outside in order to be located. That does make any sense at all. I contacted the support team hopefully they can help me with this issue

reply.author: Directed Electronics
reply.content:
Hello David,

The team will definitely assist you on that. Error 25 means your device is responding but doesn't have a current fix. Sometimes that could happen because the vehicle doesn't have a clear view of the sky and isn't able to update the fix when it should, but occasionally we find that we have to do an over the air reset to GPS. 

Thanks!

author: Dallas Petree
comment: Pairing with my car was problematic, as the instructions in the app are somewhat universal and the manual doesn't explain this at all. Once paired and I go a short distance away I don't know if I am connected via Bluetooth or not, and commands will say that they fail. Be nice to show a Bluetooth status so I know if I'm connected or not. The Bluetooth icon apparently means nothing.  Updated app review 12/30/17: new app still says "Your Bluetooth command failed or was not received. Please try again. (801)."  Nowhere in the help or internet explains what this means.

reply.author: Directed Electronics
reply.content:
Hi
Thank you for your review. The Bluetooth icon doesn’t light up with our DS4 system because the connection happens only when a command is sent. We do however have some plans to provide more feedback for BT commands/connectivity in the future.

author: Jesse Hill
comment: It's a little slow up close but very covienient. Great if your out of town or parked far away. Viper could have more option to control tempeture but it does what it's suppose to do.

author: Mighty Maxx
comment: The only thing better than 24/7 Zero alerts ?!?! are 24/7 random/multiple False alerts !!!!!!  Good job. Outstanding!!!! Now that is the complete package!!! So happy I paid an extra 500ish$ for this, to be told by one "customer service rep" that everything is functioning correctly, and by another "customer service rep" that I need an "upgrade".  Can't wait for that.  24hr customer support?  Negative.  Resolved issues during actual "business hours"?. Negative. Constant "failed command failed command failed command failed"? All day, every day.

author: Russell Hensel
comment: The entire system shuts down and you can't use the app.  Your stuck and screwed.  Worst piece of trash ever.  I would never ever ever use it again as you get stranded.

author: zach jolly
comment: Paid a lot for a car starter and the app they use is garbage. Sometime my car doesn't start. Sometimes it locks me out of my account randomly so I can't start my car. And can someone please explain the point of reminding me to start my car instead of being able to schedule it to go ahead and start it anyways. I know programmers that could throw up a better app than this company produced.

author: Alan J. Steinberg
comment: I have been using Smart Start for over 5 years. It has worked flawlessly both in the high heat of St Louis Missouri during the summer and in the bitter cold in the winter. It's an absolutely amazing device and I highly recommend it for its reasonable cost.
For the most part I really appreciate the convenience, but occasionally it kicks me to the login screen, and I can't get past it. Will not recognize my email address or password. Frustrating.

author: Luis C
comment: I'm sick and tired of your app not working just about every time the weather under 10°.  It's always telling me to make sure I have service when most of the bars on my phone are full.   THIS IS RIDICULOUS!  When my membership is done I'm not renewing.  I've had it!

author: Nathaniel Hall
comment: Made my electronic start useful. I can start my car now half way across town if I need it to warm in negative Temps near Chicago or to cool off the car in the summer. Before my remote wouldn't reach and it made the $500 system feel useful. This add-on was super redeeming. So helpful!

author: HitSquad 4Life
comment: Love the app easy to use and navigate through, I wish I had of known about the DS4 plus so I could use the Bluetooth the app by itself is slow at times I was told that the DS4 plus Bluetooth setup would make it go directly to the module and it doesn't require a payment through Viber because you're using Bluetooth. I'd recommend that but I love the app.

author: Ryan Tennant
comment: Great for now. Always a concern that an update will break the app based on past experiences, but in it's current iteration it is working very well.

reply.author: Directed Electronics
reply.content:
Hello Ryan,

One of our agents will contact you to get more details from you so we can resolve this. Apologies for the extended inconvenience. 

Thanks, 

the SmartStart team

author: Fred Jones
comment: Overall great app.  Cellular coverage in my area can effect my cars system but I'd still buy it again.  Very handy and one less remote on my key ring.

author: Michael Rutan
comment: Great app and helps a lot when the remote is too far away. Doesn't want to open the trunk all of the time but I still love it.

author: Jojit Tabug
comment: I love the bluetooth function via smartphone though sometimes it takes long for the phone to sync.  While driving the blue tooth module flashes all the time. I had to cover the light sp as not to distract while driving especially at night.

author: Mike Stalnaker
comment: With all the new home automation gadgets hitting the market, any chance of adding support for using Google home or even IFTTT to be able to say " Hey Google, start my car "?

reply.author: Directed Electronics
reply.content:
Hello Mike,

Looks like you may need to log out (link on that "no vehicles" page, then log in again. Everything should be 100% normal after that. This is related to the updated app launch logic - you should notice how much faster the app launches after you get logged in again - but we'll get to work fixing that glitch!

Thanks,

the SmartStart team

author: JC Moreno
comment: It works like it should, but there is no voice commands that work with Google assistant even though on their website it states there are voice commands that should work.  Hopefully this gets fixed or supported eventually.

author: Julius Thomas
comment: Was finally working consistently but now the widget doesn't work and always force closes. What does inactive vehicle even mean? Sigh
Dont have to wonder if i locked the car just hit the button and check the status... Nice getting into a warm car on a cold day too

author: Antjuan Simmons
comment: I've only had it for a few days but am greatly enjoying it. Especially considering the weather we are having right now.
App won't locate vehicle, even when standing right next to it.  Or it will say no cellular coverage, but there will be a cell tower right next to the car........and no issue with phone.

author: Chris Volpe
comment: So far so good.  I wish There a was more info when it fails but overall does what it needs.

author: Chris Greaves
comment: I am able to start my wife's car for her. When she is running late and I'm still at work. Awesomeness!

author: Enzo Zappulla
comment: Lmao @James. Good luck getting support for your gear S3. Tizon was doa. They should have used Android wear from day one

reply.author: Directed Electronics
reply.content: Enzo, The Smartstart application is only compatible with the Android Wear based operating system. If your watch runs the Android Wear OS please contact us directly at 800-876-0800 ext 32225 for assistance.

author: Trent Dykes
comment: It is everything you will ever need to have for your vehicle.  It can start it or find it or unlock it anywhere in the world. I worked 50 km from my vehicle on shift work up to -35. It was nice to start it 20 min before you got in. Or I just noticed a starter alarm. So you can set it to start at a certain time or temperature.  It is cool!

author: Lantz Skavinski
comment: This app is a hit and miss pos. I have been locked out of my vehicle while trying to unlock it in the freezing snow, can't use my key because the alarm will go off. I try to start it and it can't find my vehicle while I am standing right beside It! Tech support emails me back telling me everything is normal! Money wasted and now I am stuck with it.

reply.author: Directed Electronics
reply.content:
Good afternoon Lants
We are sorry you've been having such a bad experience we will have a rep reach out to you to get this issue fixed for you. We value you as a customer and will make sure you are not only getting what you paid for but that you are completely satisfied with our products as well.

author: Shawn C
comment: Will not start vehicle about 20 percent of the time, but will start it the second attempt when this happens. Works well orherwise.

author: sirron bailey
comment: I think overall it works fairly well. It lets you know where your vehicle is located you can stop and start your vehicle.
Works great with slight fault with sensitivity levels for area sensors.  They often set alarm off with any movement; leaf,wind, birds and small animals.

author: William Holton
comment: Great idea. Horrible delivery. You can unlock, lock, and start. It does alert you via email, text and the app if a alarm is triggered.  The text message is just a bunch of random characters,  but you'll at least get a notification.  If you have internet connection on your phone and cellular connection on your vehicle, it gets the basic job done. (I liked vrsion 3.0 better though)    DI should have used a freelance service to get better developers.  The biggest issue i have is the clunky behavior of the app, resulting in a slow response. It feels like the spent more on buying positive magazine reviews then actually developing this product.     If I open the app, my vehicle status should already be available.  It's not FB, if it's idle I'm not using it, if I open it, it should check my vehicle status automatically..     The Remote start schedule fails 80% of the time. It should be a alarm, with a "start or No Start" selection WITHOUT opening the app. Or just start the dang car. Why have a schedule if I have to do the work anyway?.    This only works with Google wear? If that's all you got DI, you need a better IT director,  yours still drives a dinosaur to work.   The Vehicle status is lacking. You should be able to see more. Temp? Fuel? Trans? Nope. And those are easy sensors to tap into.     The status menu should have better visuals. Green for good, yellow for error,  red for alarm ect.  Instead everything is black with a dumb yellow line under it. I'm not reading a technical manual, I'm just quick glancing, make things user friendly.   This app works, but don't expect your 70$ a year to feel worth it. DI has failed to impress.

reply.author: Directed Electronics
reply.content:
Hello William,

Thank you for posting all of this feedback - greatly appreciated. 

Your description of the text message contents is a new one; could you forward an example of that to us to take a look at? Can use the Help "report an issue" link and attach a screen grab of one of those messages, so we have the specifics. 

More to come via email.

author: Amin Jaawani
comment: It's not bad, could be a little quicker with the command feedback. With that being said I can't use it with my Gear S3,so it only gets 4 stars until then.

author: Jax Can
comment: No good. Sitting in car won't work. Once in awhile it works most time error 802

author: JTag
comment: Very convenient way to lock/unlock your car. Also gives me peace of mind since the app will notify me via text and/or email if my alarm is triggered.
